item.description:
Benjamin Belew, international award-winning composer and pianist in the neo-classical style, will perform LIVE on Saturday March 9th at 336 Monroe St. Santa Clara, CA at 5:00PM.

Benjamin is an amazing pianist and composer. His music is beautiful, awe-inspiring, and laced with a peaceful elegance. Here are some comments from YouTube about his performance of his original composition, Moonbeams:

  • “When he plays it feels like [the] piano is more [than] being played, it’s singing you a song.”
  • “…I just love this musical piece, and I have listened to it about 10 times, and still I enjoy it more and more.”
  • "Amazing stuff, this musical piece gives me a type of indescribable feeling, a feeling of warmth, trust, and satisfaction that I get by listening to music. I salute you Benjamin; you are surely an inspiration for me.”

Let's share the love of music as Benjamin Belew debuts some of his new work at this awesome concert. As usual refreshments will be served. Come join us! The concert is free and donations are welcome.
item.name: Live Neo Classical Home Concert w/ Amazing Pianist and Composer Benjamin Belew
